name: Nullsoft Streaming Audio File
summary: Learn about .NSA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Nullsoft's streaming video format uses the .NSV extension.

description: An NSA (NullSoft Streaming Audio) file is a streaming audio format developed by NullSoft for streaming audio over the internet. NullSoft also developed Winamp media player for streaming and playback of audio and video files. The NSA file format uses audio compression algorithms introduced and developed by NullSoft. NullSoft also has developed the NSV file format for streaming videos over the internet.
Streaming audio container format developed by Nullsoft; used for streaming audio clips, such as song demos over the Internet; can be played with Winamp.

instructions: To open NSA files, Winamp is the best option, especially older versions. Some other players, like VLC, might work with the right codecs or plugins.
